background_image_description: Subtle all-over vintage paper texture: small irregular speckles and scuffs in a muted beige-gray (#D6CCB6) randomly scattered on a warm cream background. No distinct shapes; low-contrast, grainy noise with light variation.

nodes.asset_description: Retro cartoon character on the right: a bright yellow (#F2C230) circular face with dark green (#1E4D3B) outlines, large white oval eyes with dark green pupils and shiny white highlights, a small rounded red-orange nose (#E35D4E) with a white highlight, and a simple curved dark green smile. The character has dark green noodle-like arms and legs, white gloves with dark green outlines, and chunky dark green shoes with white midsoles and highlights. A flat dark green oval shadow sits beneath the feet. Overall style is vintage rubber-hose animation with clean solid fills and minimal shading.
